ack.p: We thank everyone who submitted predictions for the 2014–2015 and 2015–2016 flu seasons. We thank Dr. Harvey Artsob, Dr. Carol Blair, Dr. Thomas Briese, Dr. Charles Calisher, Dr. Stephen Higgs, Dr. Laura Kramer, Dr. Nikos Vasilakis, and others for their predictions of the 2014–2015 chikungunya invasion. We thank Matt Biggerstaff and others at CDC for hosting the flu contests. We thank DARPA for hosting the chikungunya challenge.
